title: Add Privacy Policy page with Stack Teacher branding and styled cookies table

requirements.text: Create a new PrivacyPolicyPage component at frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx containing the full Privacy Policy content with all branding references using 'Stack Teacher' and 'stackteacher.com' (no 'Careerist' or 'careerist.com' references anywhere). All email references must use support@stackteacher.com and compliance@stackteacher.com. The physical address must be '30 N Gould St Ste N, Sheridan, WY 82801, USA'. The phone number must be '1234567890'. The page layout and typography should match the existing TermsOfUsePage.tsx style.
acceptanceCriteria: No occurrences of 'Careerist', 'careerist.com', or 'support@careerist.com' appear anywhere on the page
All email addresses show as support@stackteacher.com or compliance@stackteacher.com
Address displays as '30 N Gould St Ste N, Sheridan, WY 82801, USA'
Brand name 'Stack Teacher' is used consistently throughout
Page renders without errors and matches the visual style of TermsOfUsePage

requirements.text: Within the PrivacyPolicyPage, replace any plain-text or prose cookie descriptions with a styled HTML table that lists cookie categories, cookie names, purpose, and duration/expiry. The table must use Tailwind CSS classes consistent with the site's design system (e.g., bordered cells, alternating row shading, responsive overflow-x-auto wrapper).
acceptanceCriteria: A visually styled cookies table is present in the Cookies section of the Privacy Policy page
Table includes columns for at minimum: Cookie Name/Type, Purpose, and Duration
Table uses Tailwind CSS classes for borders, padding, and alternating row colors
Table is wrapped in an overflow-x-auto container for mobile responsiveness

requirements.text: Register a new /privacy-policy route in frontend/src/App.tsx that renders the PrivacyPolicyPage component, following the same routing pattern used for the existing /terms route.
acceptanceCriteria: The route is defined inside the shared Layout root route, consistent with all other routes

requirements.text: Add a 'Privacy Policy' link in the footer section of frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx that navigates to /privacy-policy, placed alongside or near the existing 'Terms of Use' link.
acceptanceCriteria: A 'Privacy Policy' link is visible in the footer
The link styling is consistent with the existing 'Terms of Use' footer link

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/components/ui/
Do not change the backend schema or any backend logic
All brand references must be 'Stack Teacher' â€” never 'Careerist'
nonGoals: Editing or modifying the existing TermsOfUsePage
Adding any backend persistence for the Privacy Policy content
Adding authentication or gating to the Privacy Policy page
Creating any new images or static assets
